full_summary:
**Stage 1: Museum Re-Roofing at the Alexander Graham Bell National Historic Site**
==============================================================

The Government of Canada, through Parks Canada, invites bids for the Re-Roofing of the Museum at the Alexander Graham Bell National Historic Site. This project involves the removal and disposal of existing low-slope roofing systems and supply and installation of new low-slope roofing systems.

**Project Overview**
------------------

The project will be carried out at the Alexander Graham Bell Museum in Baddeck, Nova Scotia. The scope of work includes:

* Removal and disposal of existing low-slope roofing systems
* Supply and installation of new low-slope roofing systems
* Roof deck repair as required
* Work required to accommodate roof top mechanical equipment, plumbing stacks, etc.
* Provision of storm water management by way of roof drains and/or scuppers and/or gutters and downspouts

**Timeline and Contract Details**
------------------------------

The contract period is expected to be completed by March 29, 2024. The estimated value of the project is between $250,001 and $500,000, including taxes.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

Bids must be submitted electronically via email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca or by facsimile to 1-855-983-1808. Only email attachments will be accepted; links to bid documents will not be considered. Submissions received in person or by courier will not be accepted.

**Important Notes**
-----------------

* The project involves a two-stage selection process. Stage 1 will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers, while Stage 2 will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project.
* The qualification list will expire within 180 days or upon award of a contract in Stage Two, whichever is earlier.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their submissions are complete and in compliance with the requirements outlined in this document.

**Inquiries and Support**
-----------------------

All inquiries and technical and contractual questions must be submitted in writing and received no later than five (5) business days prior to the tender closing date.

**Solicitation Documents**
-------------------------

The solicitation documents can be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

**Authority Contacts**
---------------------

For any questions or further information, please contact Christine Piché at soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca or (873) 355-
